categories.name: Breakfast Classics
categories.description: Start your day with our hearty breakfast options

items.name: Artisan Avocado Toast
items.description: Fresh avocado spread on sourdough bread, topped with cherry tomatoes, feta cheese, and a drizzle of olive oil

items.name: Classic Eggs Benedict
items.description: Poached eggs on toasted English muffins with Canadian bacon and hollandaise sauce

items.name: Fluffy Buttermilk Pancakes
items.description: Stack of three pancakes served with maple syrup, fresh berries, and whipped cream

categories.name: Lunch Favorites
categories.description: Satisfying midday meals made with fresh ingredients

items.name: Mediterranean Quinoa Bowl
items.description: Quinoa with roasted vegetables, chickpeas, feta cheese, and tahini dressing

items.name: Gourmet Club Sandwich
items.description: Triple-layered sandwich with turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato, and avocado on sourdough

items.name: Caesar Salad with Grilled Chicken
items.description: Crisp romaine lettuce with parmesan cheese, croutons, and our signature caesar dressing

categories.name: Beverages
categories.description: Carefully crafted drinks to complement your meal

items.name: Single Origin Espresso
items.description: Rich and aromatic espresso from ethically sourced beans

items.name: Green Power Smoothie

items.name: Vanilla Iced Latte
